creator: radekz@free.alpha.net.pl
text:
I have two directories 
a
b
and in 'b' have file that include jsp file from 'a' directory
<%@ include file="../a/page_safeheader.jsp" %>
in this case Jasper create path /b/../c/header.jsp
but he cannot find header.jsp file and include it.
I found it in JBoss that integrate Tomcat 4.1.2

I cannot reproduce this. Please attach a test case. Based on the include example, this works with the current CVS code (no relevant fixes appear to have been made, but I could be wrong):

In place evaluation of another JSP which gives you the current time: <%@ include file="../a/foo.jsp" %>

by including the output of another JSP: (this is in folder "/b" in the context, and a folder "/a" with foo.jsp exists)
creator: remm@apache.org
